title: Why do I not see the shields?
body:
So in summoners rift theres these two entrances inbetween the lanes and in them there are these shields, but for some reason they have just dissapeared on me around 2 years ago. I made a reddit post and everybody is responding with, “its still there”.
So is it because i turned them off somehow or is it just a bug?

replies.body:
Do you have "Hide eye candy" turned on? (In Game > Esc > Video).

You mean the blue/red glowy bit?
No, the actual shields aren't even there.

Do you know how there aren't any shields that block the entrances of your own base(entrances as in the two entrances in between the lanes) but there are shields for the enemy base that is like an indicator that you can go through. But for me there are no shields for either of the bases, so it looks really weird not being able to walk into the enemy entrances when there aren't anything blocking them
Do you mean the blue/red glowy barrier?
I'm not sure what you mean? Can you send me a picture of what the blue/red glowy barrier looks like?
